code: @Bean @Primary @ConditionalOnMissingBean(JdbcOperations.class) public JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate(DataSource dataSource, JdbcProperties properties) {     JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate = new JdbcTemplate(dataSource).     JdbcProperties.Template template = properties.getTemplate().     jdbcTemplate.setFetchSize(template.getFetchSize()).     jdbcTemplate.setMaxRows(template.getMaxRows()).     if (template.getQueryTimeout() != null) {         jdbcTemplate.setQueryTimeout((int) template.getQueryTimeout().getSeconds()).     }     return jdbcTemplate. }

@Bean @Primary @ConditionalOnSingleCandidate(JdbcTemplate.class) @ConditionalOnMissingBean(NamedParameterJdbcOperations.class) public NamedParameterJdbcTemplate namedParameterJdbcTemplate(JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate) {     return new NamedParameterJdbcTemplate(jdbcTemplate). }
